forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 74. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
